title: FTX cleared to repay billions to customers after bankruptcy plan approval
description: FTX received court approval for its bankruptcy plan, enabling the repayment of up to $16.5 billion to customers. The plan includes settlements with customers, creditors, and U.S. government agencies. FTX aims to repay 98% of its customers within 60 days of the plan's effective date.
content: FTX received court approval of its bankruptcy plan on Monday, which will allow it to fully repay customers using up to $16.5 billion in assets recovered since the once-leading crypto exchange collapsed.
